coreAttributes.authorTag: A faint inscription underneath the cup reads 'Mixed by DSG Foodstuffs LLC'
coreAttributes.name: Two-Tone Slushie
coreAttributes.description: A kiwi-and-strawberry flavored two-tone slushie. The label depicts a gryphon-girl wearing only an apron handing a fountain cup resembling this one out towards an imaginary customer.
coreAttributes.applyEffects:
[##npc.incrementMana(npc.getAttributeValue(ATTRIBUTE_MANA_MAXIMUM) * 0.15)]

A powerful wave of arcane energy washes over [npc.name]...

[#npc.addPotionEffect(ATTRIBUTE_RESISTANCE_FIRE, 1)]
